title: Verify: selecting WWE successfully launches WWE application
custom_preconds: GIVEN the WWE app has been installed.
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the WWE Network icon.
custom_expected: THEN the WWE Network will open successfully.

title: Verify: PAYWALL appears when not logged into app
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user does not have an account logged into the WWE Network
custom_steps:
WHEN the user launches the WWE Network app
AND attempts to play any video
custom_expected:
THEN the PAYWALL appears which bars the user from video playback
AND PAYWALL appears as expected
AND user can activate SUBSCRIBER SIGN-IN

title: Verify: PAYWALL does not appear when valid credentials are already logged in.
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the app has previously been logged in with a WWE Network account
custom_steps:
WHEN the WWE Network app is accessed
AND Video is launched
custom_expected:
THEN the PAYWALL is not encountered
AND video plays back

title: Verify: Clicking SUBSCRIBER SIGN IN advances to Sign In screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the WWE app has a been accessed
AND there is no account logged into the app
custom_steps: WHEN the Subscriber Sign In button is clicked
custom_expected:
THEN the app advances to the Sign In screen
AND the EMAIL and PASSWORD fields are both blank

title: Verify: Clicking the BACK button on the Remote Control at the Sign-In screen returns to screen last viewed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the WWE app has a been accessed
AND there is no account logged into the app
AND the app has accessed the Member Sign In Screen via the SIGN IN button at HOME
custom_steps:
WHEN the BACK button on the REMOTE CONTROL has been pressed
AND the user then attempts to launch ON NOW and sees the PAYWALL
AND advances to Sign-in via SUBSCRIBER SIGN-IN button
WHEN the BACK button on the REMOTE CONTROL has been pressed
custom_expected: THEN the app returns to the Home in both instances noted in Steps

title: Verify: Clicking BACK button on Sign-In screen box returns to Home
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the WWE app has a been accessed
AND there is no account logged into the app
AND the app has accessed the Member Sign In Screen
custom_steps:
WHEN the BACK button on the Member Sign In screen has been accessed
AND the user then attempts to launch ON NOW and sees the PAYWALL
AND advances to Sign-in via SUBSCRIBER SIGN-IN button
WHEN the BACK button on the Member Sign In screen has been accessed
custom_expected: THEN the app returns to Home in both cases.

title: Verify: Clicking CONTINUE after inputting valid Email/Password advances to the WWE Home screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the WWE app has been accessed
AND there is no account logged into the app
AND the app has accessed the Member Sign In Screen
custom_steps:
WHEN a valid Email address has been inputted in the Email field
AND a valid Password has been inputted in the Password field
AND the Continue button has been pressed
custom_expected: THEN the app advances to the WWE Home screen

title: Verify: Clicking CONTINUE while Email and/or Password is blank yields error message
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the WWE app has been accessed
AND there is no account logged into the app
AND the app has accessed the Member Sign In Screen
custom_steps:
WHEN the email and/or password field has been left blank
AND the CONTINUE button is pressed
custom_expected:
THEN and error message appears 

"USER or PASSWORD unrecognized"

title: Verify: Clicking CONTINUE while Email and/or Password is incorrect yields an error message
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the WWE app has been accessed
AND there is no account logged into the app
AND the app has accessed the Member Sign In Screen
custom_steps:
WHEN the email and/or password field is incorrect
AND the Continue button is pressed
custom_expected:
THEN an error message is displayed

"USER or PASSWORD unrecognized"

title: Update: Verify user's settings are kept intact when updating to new version
custom_preconds: When an update for the app becomes available and is installed, the app should remember the user's settings that were set before the update.
custom_steps:
1. Install retail version of app
2. Log in with valid user account 
3. Set user profile settings and note what they are
4. Update app to test build
5. launch app and sign in with user account used in step #2
custom_expected:
User settings are remembered/acknowledged after update install.

App performs without issue.

title: Home: Verify data updates within 30 seconds
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed the WWE Network
AND we have accessed the Channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we are on the Home Screen
AND the Live Broadcast changes
custom_expected:
THEN the Menu will refresh within 30 seconds
AND the On Now display will update accordingly

> NOTE: 
> ON NOW program is based off of Media_On state of EPG ( http://epg.media.net.wwe.com/epg_large.json )
> ON NOW can (and usually will) publish a few minutes ahead of the scheduled time. This is backend, it's not a client-side issue and as long as the actual change occurs before the hour, it can get a pass
